title: Venus Transit in the 8th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Venus transiting the eighth house brings emotional depth, intimacy, and transformation for Leo ascendants. Hidden matters in relationships and shared finances come into focus. Attraction intensifies, but clarity and trust are essential. This phase supports healing, deeper bonding, and financial restructuring when approached with honesty. Avoid secrecy-driven decisions; balanced vulnerability turns intensity into growth.

sections.heading: Career
points: Benefits in research or confidential roles

sections.heading: Finance
points: Focus on joint finances or taxes

closing: This transit transforms closeness and values. With honesty and balance, depth becomes a source of strength.
